content.rendered:
Window Vision

Window vision is called by many names and descriptions. You may also know these signs  as see-thru window graphics, see-thru window decals, perforated window vision, window graphics, etc.

Customers can watch YouTube tutorials and learn how to install window vision, see-thru window graphics, see-thru window decals, perforated window vision, window graphics, etc. and save money by installing their own window treatments. YouTube has a great selection of videos to assist you in learning how to install your own graphics. The benefit is that you save money.  Installing perforated window graphics is similar to installing wallpaper or window tint. The key is to make sure you have no a clean surface to adhere the graphics to and no bubbles in the material so that it lays flat. A trick of the trade is to use soap and water (kitchen soap) to be able to manipulate your graphics if you put them on crooked . You can buy your custom window graphics at $3.50 sq ft. thru Posterhead Signs.  If Posterhead has one of their technicians install the graphics, the price is $5.00 sq ft.

Designing the graphics is part of the price (includes basic graphics) and the window graphics can be an array of colors and pictures. There is no limit to the amount of colors or pictures you can have on the perforated window graphics.

Posterhead can print your custom-made window vision in many different colors and designs. Many businesses are using their storefront windows as a means of advertising to increase exposure to their goods and services and bypass the governments sign regulations that limit signage.

Posterhead Las Vegas can make your custom-designed window vision, see-thru window graphics, see-thru window decals, perforated window vision, window graphics at an affordable rate and give you the option of self installation to save money.

Need car stickers or car decals ? Posterhead can also make custom car stickers and decals. Car Wraps and Truck wraps also available. Car Lettering and Box truck lettering is easy and cheap ! Contact Posterhead for a quote.

 

For any specific styles or sizes not shown here contact us for details & prices.
